message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"smile or laugh","sentence":"他们笑。","image_prompt":"A group of people, including men and women of different ages, standing together and all smiling and laughing. Each person's expression clearly shows joy and happiness. The scene is set in a soft apocalypse animation style, meaning there are gently faded backgrounds and hints of a dreamy, slightly surreal world, but the people look cheerful and connected.","sentence_translation":"They smile."}
